roleset.name: cause to have color
roleset.note: DYE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dye' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'dyed' based on BOLT-7. Verbnet entry 24 41.2.2. (from dye.01-v)
DYED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dyed.01-j)

example.name: dye-v: all args
example.text: John dyed his hair, and much of the bathroom, bright green.
example.arg: his hair, and much of the bathroom,

example.name: dyed-j
example.text: This old man , even though your hair is dyed , but ... in 2008 you still kept your teeth so healthy .
